## General info

CartApi is an application that cover the most basic use cases for a shopping cart:

-   add items to cart
-   remove items from cart
-   show all items in cart
-   checkout and place an order

## Technologies

This project has been developed with PHP 8.0, Laravel 9 and Lucid Arch (https://docs.lucidarch.dev/).
All endpoints implemented are documented in compliance with OPENAPI 3.0

## Features

-   Add item to cart
-   Remove item from cart
-   List items
-   Checkout
-   Postman Collection
-   OpenApi Specs
